feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.55
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for react dashboard
  • Fixes for subscriptions with values less that 1 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10754
  • Fix refreshBTCPrice being out of scope by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10758
  • Various Updates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10759
  • v5.11.55 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10771

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.54...v5.11.55

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.56
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.55...v5.11.56

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.58
